review_data.title: Favorite for Pasta
review_data.content: This place is well known among the Zurich locals, and a favorite in my family for excellent Pasta dishes. My personal favorite is the Penne a l'Arrabbiata. Location is close to the Opera, at Stadelhoferplatz.
